statements: SELECT * FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_phone_number FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_birthdate FROM PatientInformation ORDER BY patient_birthdate DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_phone_number FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT patient_name, patient_birthdate, patient_address FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_birthdate DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_birthdate BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT full_name, address, date_of_birth, medical_history FROM patients ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' AND access_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, gender, race FROM demographics WHERE race = 'Asian' ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01'
SELECT full_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY full_name ASC
SELECT patients.full_name, access_logs.access_time FROM patients INNER JOIN access_logs ON patients.patient_id = access_logs.patient_id
SELECT patients.full_name, demographics.gender, demographics.race FROM patients INNER JOIN demographics ON patients.patient_id = demographics.patient_id WHERE demographics.gender = 'F'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT physician_name, treatment_plan FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE table_accessed = 'patients';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT patient_name, physician_name, treatment_plan FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, access_time, action FROM access_logs WHERE table_accessed = 'patients';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_condition FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_location FROM Doctors;
SELECT patient_id, record_date, record_details, record_status FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC, patient_dob DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_condition FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Female';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, PatientRecords.record_date, PatientRecords.record_details FROM Patients INNER JOIN PatientRecords ON Patients.patient_id = PatientRecords.patient_id WHERE PatientRecords.record_status='Active' ORDER BY PatientRecords.record_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_location FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty ASC, doctor_location DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Doctors.doctor_name, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE Appointments.appointment_status='Scheduled' ORDER BY Appointments.appointment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id = 3 AND status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT hospital_name, address, phone_number FROM Hospitals;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, department FROM Doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT hospital_name, address, phone_number FROM Hospitals WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';

SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments INNER JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
